verbose_text: 7-Methylguanosine 5 '-triphosphate (m 7 GTP) pull-down assays showed that a significantly lower amount of eIF4E4 was pulled down from CRK1 RNAi cells than from the non induced control cells (XREF_FIG), indicating that the association of eIF4E4 with the m 7 G cap requires CRK1 phosphorylation.
